paudgalika waidya widyalayata bandawagath desiya pasdena ilakka karagena wishwawidyalaye adhyapana katayuthu aarambha kala da ee pirisa nosalakahara eeta pasuwa bandawagath paswana kandayame shishyayan 70 k saha hayawani kandayame 98 k wishwawidyala prathipadana komishan sabhawe liyapadinchi kirima asadharana bawa da demapiyo pawasathi.

ema sakshi layisthuwe palamu wana sakshikaru lesa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha nam kara athi athara sesu sakshikaruwan lesa rawaya karthru wiktar ayiwan, janadhipathi nithignya upul jayasuriya, janatha wimukthi peramune parlimenthu manthri anura kumara disanayaka, adhikarana sewa komisame lekamwaraya, chithrapata adhyaksha prasanna withanage yana aya da nam kara thibe.

ithin godak adu gasthuwak lamayingen aragena, layit bil wathura bil ehemath gewala, kamath istharam widihata denna puluwan wune kotiya sarge thibuna manejmant skil nisamayi.ee dawaswala idiaappa 70 - 80 kapu lamayi, pangedi deka thunak kapu lamayi ehemath hostal eke hitiyalu.kohoma wunath hamadama rata hostal ekenma kana eka godak lamayinta echcharama direwwe na.ithin sathiyata dawasak dekak dinar eka ganna podi awutin parak danna 10, 11 wasarawala samahara lamayi purudu wela hitiyalu.oya wadeta ithin godakma thoragaththe "rahima" eka.
